TSOCMD "ALTUSER JIM SPECIAL"

RACF bits and pieces

RDEFINE SITE RACF.GURU UACC(READ) DATA(‘RACF TOOLS AND INFO’)

I really only bought this domain for the email address but figured I may as well put some content up alongside it.

ADDSD ‘JIM.TOOLS’ UACC(READ)

z/OS tools - SETRRCVT and some other bits and pieces
IRRXUTIL samples - Some samples of IRRXUTIL
ENUM - Enumeration Rexx in collaboration with SoF & Ayoul3
Probable Wordlists - Passwords edited to conform to UPPERCASE and 8 character max standards.
MFBBEdit Modules - Modules for BBEdit for ReXX and JCL highlighting.
MFWordlists - Wordlists for use in cracking RACF passwords

PERMIT ‘JIM.POSTS’ ID(*) ACCESS(READ)

  • Finding RVARY password hashes
  • ISRDDN Control Block Browsing
  • Extracting passwords using zSecure
  • Extracting password history from RACF
  • hashcat commands for RACF passwords
